item.title: ESP32-DOIT Tasmota help
item.description:
Make sure you flash the tasmota32.factory.bin image

Other than that, you can follow from step 7 of the Sonoff S31 smart plug mod tutorial

item.title: Sonoff S31 Smart Plug Mod
